name: oNyaa-Chan-Venture!
description:
Based on oNyaa-Chan by Kisaka Toriama - https://www.webtoons.com/en/challenge/onyaa-chan/list?title_no=415713

The square and X buttons represent Z and X respectively on the keyboard. Bump into things to pick up or interact with them.

I was getting back into Pico-8 and following mboffin's great adventure game tutorial when I thought it would be fun to make a game with my friend Kisa's adorable catgirl sisters. That's pretty much it!
